select.id: select構成市町村マスタリストBy主キー1

mapper.sql:
SELECT DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster.*, DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho.*, DbT5913ChosainJoho.* FROM ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster") AS DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho") AS DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho ON DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster."dbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster_shichosonCode" = DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho."dbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho_shichosonCode" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho") AS DbT5913ChosainJoho ON DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho."dbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho_shichosonCode" = DbT5913ChosainJoho."dbT5913ChosainJoho_shichosonCode" AND DbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho."dbT5910NinteichosaItakusakiJoho_ninteichosaItakusakiCode" = DbT5913ChosainJoho."dbT5913ChosainJoho_ninteichosaItakusakiCode"
1 = 1
AND DbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster."dbT5051KoseiShichosonMaster_shichosonShokibetsuID" = #{shichosonShokibetsuID}
